column1: Local Foods////The food presentation and the atmosphere is 4.5 stars
column2: but my tuna fish sandwich and the tomato basil soup were really really salty. Still edible
column3: but off-putting. I couldn't remember why I don't go to Local Foods more often when soup and sandwich is my jam
column4: and then I eat here and it all comes back to me. The flavors just don't match up to how nice the food looks.
